title: "First Man" Flag Controversy & Backlash Over Nike's Deal with Colin Kaepernick | DeRay Mckesson
itunes:title: "First Man" Flag Controversy & Backlash Over Nike's Deal with Colin Kaepernick | DeRay Mckesson
description:
Trevor looks at high-profile boycotts, Democrats cry foul at Brett Kavanaugh's Supreme Court confirmation hearing, and DeRay Mckesson discusses "On the Other Side of Freedom."
